document_data.mainbody:
ne-Eyed Jukk was a fence of stolen goods inhabiting Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
One-Eyed Jukk worked out of the Bloody Fist tavern located in Waterdeeps Dock Ward where Presper Street and Shrimp Alley joined Snail Street. He dealt exclusively in stolen weapons, armor, and fine metalwork.
